00013 #include <util/archives/Serializable_includes.h>
00014 
00015 
00016 #include <cstdio> 
00017 
00018 namespace McMd
00019 {
00020 
00021    using namespace Util;
00022 
00023    /* 
00024    * Constructor.
00025    */
00026    McEnergyAverage::McEnergyAverage(McSystem& system)
00027     : SystemDiagnostic<McSystem>(system),
00028       outputFile_(),
00029       accumulator_(),
00030       nSamplePerBlock_(1),
00031       isInitialized_(false)
00032    {}
00033 
00034    /*
00035    * Read parameters and initialize.
00036    */
00037    void McEnergyAverage::readParam(std::istream& in)
00038    {
00039 
00040       readInterval(in);
00041       readOutputFileName(in);
00042       read<int>(in,"nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00043 
00044       accumulator_.setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00045 
00046       // If nSamplePerBlock != 0, open an output file for block averages.
00047       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00048          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00049       }
00050 
00051       isInitialized_ = true;
00052    }
00053 
00054    /*
00055    * Clear accumulator.
00056    */
00057    void McEnergyAverage::setup() 
00058    {  accumulator_.clear(); }
00059  
00060    /* 
00061    * Evaluate energy, and add to accumulator.
00062    */
00063    void McEnergyAverage::sample(long iStep) 
00064    {
00065       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00066          accumulator_.sample(system().potentialEnergy(), outputFile_);
00067       }
00068    }
00069 
00070    /*
00071    * Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00072    */
00073    void McEnergyAverage::output() 
00074    { 
00075       // If outputFile_ was used to write block averages, close it.
00076       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00077          outputFile_.close();
00078       }
00079 
00080       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00081       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00082       outputFile_.close();
00083 
00084       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".ave"), outputFile_);
00085       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00086       outputFile_.close();
00087    }
00088    
00089    /*
00090    * Save state to binary file archive.
00091    */
00092    void McEnergyAverage::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00093    { ar & *this; }
00094 
00095    /*
00096    * Load state from a binary file archive.
00097    */
00098    void McEnergyAverage::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00099    { ar & *this; }
00100 
00101 }
